title: Vignette Title

title: Vignette Title
text: html_vignette template includes basic CSS theme. override theme can specify CSS document metadata follows:

title: Vignette Title
text: figure sizes customised can easily put two images side--side.  can enable figure captions fig_caption: yes YAML: can use chunk option fig.cap = "figure caption." knitr.
code: plot(1:10) plot(10:1) output:   rmarkdown::html_vignette:     fig_caption: yes

title: Vignette Title
text: can write math expressions, e.g. \(Y = X\beta + \epsilon\), footnotes1, tables, e.g. using knitr::kable(). Also quote using >: “gives [code] safety [code] speed deserves neither.” (via)

what: R Interface to the Global Population Dynamics Database
title: R Interface to the Global Population Dynamics Database
text: DEPRECATED package longer necessary, GPDD can now downloaded directly .csv files KNB repostitory: https://doi.org/10.5063/F1BZ63Z8 package originally provided R interface Global Population Dynamics Database, data served -longer-maintained API provided Microsoft Access DataBase format, made access difficult R users.

Restricted data sets table — gpdd_restricted
text: Due licensing restrictions 686 series 6 sources distributed without permission owner. data British Trust Ornithology’s Common Bird Census (97) Constant Effort Recording Scheme (32), Rothamstead Experimental Station, UK (9), National monitoring programme wintering wildfowl Norway 1980 – 93 (T. Nygard, 23), Phalacrocorax carbo (Great cormorant) Somateria mollissima (Common eider) series supplied N. Rov (2) data insect light trapping supplied H. Wolda (523).

title: The taxon table — gpdd_taxon
text: taxon table stores taxonomic names relating Main records. links MAIN table unique TaxonID.  series species.  extra information regarding breeding habitats etc may found notes column

title: The time period table — gpdd_timeperiod
text: TimePeriod look-table provides text descriptions temporal period sample relates 'January', 'Spring', 'Week 1' 'Day 1'.

title: GPDD version information — gpdd_version
text: Version 2.0 (released 2010). Version 1.0 (released 1999) now superseded v2.0 includes following enhancements,

title: GPDD version information — gpdd_version
text: -  consistent definition time-series. - Consistent metadata. - Units. - Sampling protocol. - Consistent temporal coding. - Addition missing location information, spatial bounds study areas spatial accuracy index. - Abundance data supplied ‘retro-transformed’ well published source units. - Improved documentation. - 123 additional time-series included, courtesy Barry Brook (University Adelaide). - Removal un-cited associated data including body size biotope information.

what: rgpdd: an R interface to the Global Population Dynamics Database — rgpdd
title: rgpdd: an R interface to the Global Population Dynamics Database — rgpdd
text: GPDD initially compiled John Prendargast, Ellen Bazeley-White?, Owen Smith, John Lawton Pablo Inchausti released 1999. Version 2.0 released 2010 following substantial restructuring database addition 123 new series David Kidd Sarah Knight.
